mapper.select: select skill_no, field_no, name from pf_skill
select ps.skill_no, ps.field_no, ps.name from pf_member_skill pms join pf_skill ps on pms.skill_no=ps.skill_no where general_member_no=#{memberNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from pf_member_skill where general_member_no=#{memberNumber} and skill_no=#{skillNumber}
mapper.select: select skill_no, field_no, name from pf_skill where name=#{skillName} limit 1

select pms.member_skill_no, pms.general_member_no, pms.skill_no, pms.level from pf_member_skill as pms join pf_skill as ps on pms.skill_no=ps.skill_no where pms.general_member_no=#{memberNumber} and ps.name=#{skillName}
